introduction.heading: Developing our digital tomorrow
introduction.main: To finally share user-centered and innovative software "Made in Germany" with the whole world, we develop outstanding digital products in the followinng three categories

software-laboratory.description: Together, we design, develop, and test your digital project.
software-laboratory.title: Software Laboratory

content.text: We offer advice for the ideal implementation, tech stack, and UI design for your application.
content.title: Concept & Design

content.text: During product development, we focus on user-centered testing and an iterative design process.
content.title: Prototyping & User-Testing

content.text: Our inter­disciplinary team develops the project - involving your developers or completely autonomous.
content.title: Software Development

content.text: We guarantee smooth and reliable management of your project after going live.
content.title: Hosting & Support

consulting.description: We evaluate the technical development of existing projects
consulting.title: Solution Assessment

content.text: Which technological decisions were made & how well do they fit the state of the project? How high is the software quality of the project?
content.title: Eva­luation of your Tech Stack & Product

content.text: Which hurdles need to be overcome during development and which dependencies exist for functionaries of the team?
content.title: Eva­luation of the develop­ment process

content.text: Was the project developed appropriately and is the application scalable?
content.title: Future-Proofing

content.text: We offer advice on the implementation of new development processes and on the introduction of modern technology.
content.title: Consulting

ventures.description: We believe in visionaries. Together, we change the world.
ventures.title: Digital Ventures

content.text: We help you during all necessary steps and are will participate with a work or money investment
content.title: Investment & Venture-Founding

content.text: We develop a cost-efficient MVP and while always evaluating our customers needs.
content.title: User-Testing & Project Design

content.text: We always look into the future and work together to ensure that the product is ready for high demands  - no matter how complex the project is.
content.title: Scalability and Future-Proofing

content.text: Our flexible team mostly consists of fellow entrepreneurs. Use this spirit to push forward your own project.
content.title: Strong Partners for the Future

seo.title: Contakt
seo.description: Contact us to plan your innovative digital software project.

business-card.heading: Plan a 30 minute online exchange!
business-card.text: "Tell me more about your project! I look forward to meeting you."

form.heading: Contact Request
form.name: YOUR NAME*
form.invalid-phone-number: Please enter a valid phone number!

error.title: Error!
error.text: Something went wrong. Please try again later!

seo.title: Legal Notice
seo.description: At hubblr, we develop innovative software products \"Made in Germany\" and support you all the way from MVP to complex enterprise software.
